name: Scholar Stream
briefDescription: A full-stack scholarship management platform to help students explore, apply, and track scholarships with role-based access and admin tools.
challenges: Integrating role-based access with Firebase, managing dynamic content rendering, and implementing smooth animations for a responsive UI.
futurePlans: Add more analytics dashboards for admins, integrate additional payment options, and improve accessibility.
shortDescription: Scholarship management platform with React, TailwindCSS, and Node.js.

name: Appsphere
briefDescription: A responsive app-store UI that displays apps, supports live search, app details pages with review charts, and localStorage-based installation management.
challenges: Implementing live search with sorting, managing localStorage installation, and visualizing app reviews using Recharts.
futurePlans: Add user authentication, backend integration, and rating/comment system.
shortDescription: Responsive app-store UI with search, charts, and installation management.
